name: Nicky is my Secret Santa?!
description:
You just participated in Secret Santa, and drew the name ‘Nicky’. She’s super cute, but you don’t know her well enough to buy her a present… maybe if you ask her out you can change that?

This visual novel was made by me (bunnygirlnicky) as a Christmas gag. I wrote the script live on Twitch, and here is the final product! This is a short story with about 5-10 minutes of playtime.

Thanks to my lovely pals for letting me use their vtubers as extra characters. Shoutout to ezQuiet, lady_myriad, and yoshidosam for their png cameos!

BACKGROUND ASSET CREDITS (CloudNovel users):

Modern Street: Konett | Forest, Lake, Fantasy Forest 2: fluffness | Cave A: Sonya | Cafe: iluminu

This visual novel was created using CloudNovel.
